column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I just love this place. The ramen is very delicious.  The atmosphere is fun and upbeat.  If you've never had ramen
column2: they will explain the entire thing to you so that you understand what to order to best suit your tastes.  You also get to customize it
column3: so that it's just how you want your soup. It's very worth making this place a common stop.  Hands down
